segments.advisor_message: It's great to hear you're thinking about investment growth! Before we dive in, can you tell me where you're currently domiciled? This will help us tailor the options for you.
segments.client_message: Sure! I'm living in the UK right now. I've been really excited about how the market's been doing lately, especially with tech stocks!

segments.advisor_message: That's a fantastic region for investment. Are you also a tax resident here in the UK, just to clear that up?
segments.client_message: Yep, I'm definitely a tax resident here. I think that's important, right? I just can't help but feel there's a lot of potential for growth even amid some of the ups and downs.

segments.advisor_message: Absolutely, being a tax resident does make a difference. So, what’s your current employment status? Are you still with your employer?
segments.client_message: Oh yeah, I'm employed full-time. Just feel like, you know, with some good investments I might be able to retire a bit earlier than planned! I was thinking around 60 or so if things go well.
